getDigitalInputOutputModuleServiceParam() getDigitalInputOutputModuleServiceParamDigitalInputOutputApi.c DigitalInputOutputApi.cgetDigitalInputOutputModuleServiceParam
uint8_t getDigitalInputOutputModuleServiceParam (uint16_t digital_inpoutput_handler, uint16_t parameter_name, void * data)
Retrieves the service parameter data for a specified DIO module.
Parameters
indigital_inpoutput_handler
The handler for the DIO device.
outdimod_processdata
Pointer to the dimodule_processinfo structure to store process data.
Returns
Returns an error code indicating the status of the operation. Refer to error_code_t for possible error codes.
